name: NEW: Western American Tuxedo
description:
Hey, everybody knows we love the work of Nudie Cohn, the Ukrainian born designer whose beautiful western wear was found on everybody from Elvis to the Flying Burrito Brothers. If you don't know him, look him up! This shirt, while heavily influenced by Nudie's creativity, is entirely original Kari Workman artwork, along with some help from the Garage Ts guys. Complete with mother pearl snaps, rhinestones and all the rest. The images on the shoulders are of a yucca (left) and a Bitterroot. Two stunning examples of the plant life here in the west. The back features an eagle, spread-winged and in flight.

These shirts will see their official release on 12/14/13, Saturday, but until then, we're taking pre-orders. We expect the first batch to move quickly.

Printed in Montana on American-made, American Apparel shirts. 50/50 Cotton Poly. We printed unisex, which should be true to size for men, and women typically should order a size smaller than their normal shirt size.

name: NEW: Montana Coat of Arms
description:
We released this design last year for the kids and OH MY was it popular with the adults. This holiday season we bring you the "Kids MT Coat of Arms*" (*for adults), with larger print size, adult shirts and nothing else different. Hey, when you've got a good thing going, keep it simple.

Still printed on the American Apparel tri-blend track shirt in Athletic Grey with Gold and Navy prints.

name: New: Monfuckintana: High, Wide and Handsome Bison
description:
The kings and queens of the prairies, the American Buffalo, once roamed freely and numbered in the millions. After a century of slaughter, only a few of these majestic ungulates have held on. Now the center of controversy any time they move their range outside of their fenced-in habitat, the buffalo is a proud, melancholy reminder of the wild past of the American plains. The Bison design marks the third in the High, Wide and Handsome series, preceded by the Trout and Pronghorn designs.

Printed on soft Hanes Eco sweatshirts.

name: High Wide Ram Hat
description: Here's Statriot's crowd-pleasin' favorite: our High, Wide, Ram in the hat format.  The hat's brown  in color, with a velcro back closure with a High, Wide, Ram patch expertly sewn on for your comfort and enjoyment. It's brim is guaranteed to keep the sun's rays off your face. Note: patch is now ringed in brown, vs. green pictured.

name: Yuccatana
description:
The yucca's a prickly reminder of Montana's aridity, and high plains beauty, and once a year they bloom with beautiful flowers. This Andy Smetanka-designed shirt is a nod to the 2/3 of Montana that lies east of center, with wild horses, yucca, prickly pear cactus and sage. Men's are printed (in Missoula) on American-made, American Apparel 100% cotton camel colored shirts and women's 50/50 heather plum shirts.

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: NEW! Atypical Muley: High Wide & Handsome Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
Buck Mule deer, common to the drier, more open country east of the continental divide -though certainly not exclusively- come in two kinds: typical and atypical, or "non-typical." The basic deal is you've either got antlers that are mirror images of the other, or like this, totally wild and different from the other. The atypical in our experience is much less common. You'll need to look elsewhere for expertise on the subject, but we at Statriot have always been fans of the less symmetrical, the less perfect in everything. 

And thus this design here, the Atypical Muley. Released in late summer 2013, this design features a collaboration between Missoula artist Kari Workman and the Statriot team. Kari drew the deer, we laid out the type, messed around with the state outline and picked the colors. 

Printed on Champion sweatshirts in Montana, U.S.A.

name: New! Kids MONTANA Coat of Arms
description: This newly revamped design comes in sizes 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 on the ever popular (cuz it feels good!) AA tri-blend athletic grey shirt with either a Red, Navy or Gold print. Hott for the holidays!

name: Snagpoles
description:
Snagpoles, the combination of two things you see around here. Snags, dead pines, and telephone poles. the internal rings, demarcating the Treasure State's political boundaries are made of chainsaw chain. Printed in the Garden City on 50/50 cotton/poly American-made American Apparel shirt. Men's and women's color: heather forest.

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: NEW! Atypical Muley: High Wide & Handsome
description:
Buck Mule deer, common to the drier, more open country east of the continental divide come in two kinds: typical and atypical, or "non-typical." The basic deal is you've either got antlers that are mirror images of the other, or like this, totally wild and different from the other. The atypical in our experience is much less common. You'll need to look elsewhere for expertise on the subject, but we at Statriot have always been fans of the less symmetrical, the less perfect in everything. And thus this design here, the Atypical Muley. Released in late summer 2013, this design features a collaboration between Missoula artist Kari Workman and the Statriot team. Kari drew the deer, we laid out the type, messed around with the state outline and picked the colors. 

Printed on American Apparel 50/50 cotton-poly blend, Heather Lake Blue shirts in Montana, U.S.

name: Moose: Monfuckintana
description:
The ol' super-paddled, long-legged wanderer of the woods and bogs is a pretty excellent example of adaptation and the impressive way ol' Ma Nature has of figuring things out.  Largest of the deer family, in fact. If you've done some back country hikes, or travel the two lane roads of our state, you probably have seen a moose or two. We're always stoked to see one, just don't cross 'em. Interesting fact: In Britain a moose is what gets called an "elk."
Product info: Men's/Women's shirts on 100% preshrunk cotton American Apparel tees. Women: army with white ink, men: navy with yellow ink.

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: Montana Coat of Arms Zip-Up Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
This navy hooded sweatshirt is a crowd-pleaser, friend. It's  got our Montana Coat of Arms design printed, di-rectly onto the left side to make it a handsome, garment. Wear it to the Buckin' Horse Sale (if it's unseasonably cold) or to Showdown Ski Hill to sip a hot Alpine. It's just that versatile. It is just. That. Versatile.

These are printed on U.S.A. made American Apparel. Unisex.

name: Wild Hentana
description:
Everybody knows that if Ben Franklin had gotten his way, the wild turkey would’ve been the national symbol of the U.S. Think of that! What would’ve been different about the past 225 or so years with a gobbler as our mascot?  Wait, you didn’t know that? Did you know that Kitt Kourage is allergic (he thinks) to turkeys?

The inspiration for this shirt comes from one our big inspirations, Aimee McQ., Betty’s Divine’s owner. Aimee’s shop sells more Statriot gear than anywhere, and we’d wanted to do a new design specifically with Betty’s in mind. When asked, Aimee said she’d just become a acquainted with a gaggle of wild turkeys somewhere in her backyard or driveway, and had started researching these fascinating things. They’re smart, resilient and they sleep in trees. While not maybe typically what you think of when you think of ‘ma natures most beautiful creations, there’s a certain rugged, glorious beauty in a turkey, sort of like Fay Dunaway in Barfly or something.

This design comes via Kari Workman, a Missoula artist whose work can be seen here: http://www.kariworkman.blogspot.com/

Interesting fact: In Blackfoot, turkeys are called ómahksipi'kssíí, meaning “big bird”.

Colors-wise, the women's shirt comes in Apricot and the men's in Cream, these are printed on 100% cotton American-made American Apparel shirts.

name: Montana Closer Hat
description: Premium product alert: This soft mesh ball cap with Statriot's Closer design, on an embroidered patch, making this a one of a kind keeper. Adjustable velcro back helps this to fit on heads of all sizes.

name: Montruckintana
description:
This iconic camper on the back of a truck, with Montana's outline subtly painted on the truck's door doesn't ha. That's it. We picture it somewhere near Fort Peck lake, fishing. Or maybe on Flathead. Or maybe the Fresno Reservoir. These are hand-printed in Montana, with water-based ink and are meant to have a light, worn-in look and feel after a few washes.

These are printed on Alternative Apparel on their cigar color, which is like a lighter, complex brown. We've also got a few rust colored women's shirts.

name: Montanka
description:
This new shirt marks Statriot’s first collaborative project with Missoula artist, animator and writer, Andy Smetanka. The Montanka design captures the Treasure state at its most scenic.
A lake, a mountain range and a sky offer Montana’s scenic treasures, without any other hokey bullshit. Andy’s done animation work for musicians ranging from the Decemberists and Missoulians Volumen to Salt Lakers Le Force. More recently Smetanka’s work has been featured in films such as award winning Cannuck film My Winnipeg, and at the Big Sky Documentary Film Festival. Andy’s work has a classic, timeless feel, and is rendered with just an Exacto knife and sheets of card stock!

Three color print on Brown 100% cotton American Apparel t-shirts. Sizes available, Men’s S thru XL, Women’s S thru L

name: New! Osprey: High, Wide and Handsome
description:
To welcome in 2013 we unveiled this companion shirt to the Montruckintana. It's got what we figure is one of Montana's great avian symbols and simultaneously one of the Treasure State's most steadfast dwellers: the Osprey.  These inveterate fishers can be seen plying their trade across the waterways of Montana. 

These shirts are hand-printed here in Montana on Alternative Apparel (men's, black) and American Apparel (women's, heather black) shirts. 

We've got a few remnants from our first run which are printed on Gildan tees. Men's are 100% cotton on Black. Women's are fitted, and on this heather "chocolate" color.

name: New Sticker: Atypical Muley Monfuckintana
description: Our newest design, in sticker form. Printed in the U.S. high quality, waterproof. Durable. Sticker size is 4" x 4".

name: New Sticker: Montana Letters
description: Montana's a place with large (often) concrete letters on its hills and mountains. Whether it's Butte, Bozeman or Missoula's Ms, or Missoula's L, or Drummond's D, pretty much any town worth its salt puts a letter on hill. We've tweaked this design a bit to update it for the times, and printed it on circles. The result is quite pleasing! U.S. made, waterproof and high quality. Sticker is 3.5" in diameter.

name: BARGAIN ALERT: STATE SEAL TANK AND KOOZIE
description: As an end of summer 2013 bruhaha blowout, we're doing a discount on these tanks and can cozies or "koozies" as we call 'em.  This will end when we're out of product, or on the 10th of September, whichever comes first.

name: SALE: Go Griz! Montana Coat of Arms + Wapiti
description:
You're familiar with our best-sellin' Montana Coat of Arms design. These are a little foray into the world of Maroon and Silver. 

Two great colors that go great together. Supplies are ultra-limited, so if you like one, order it quick. We won't be making more of these soon.

options.name: Men's Small Montana Coat Of Arms
Men's Medium Montana Coat of Arms
Men's Large Montana Coat of Arms
Men's X Large Montana Coat of Arms

name: State Seal: Monfuckintana
description:
This design features the Statriot interpretation of Montana's state seal,  with the Spanish: "Oso y Patos" bannered, along its bottom. The shirts are printed on a handsome Lapis American Apparel 100% cotton shirt. Men's Sizes S thru XL, Women's S through L.

See also our koozie and tank top lines.

name: Osprey Monfuckintana
description:
This American Apparel 50/25/25 blend is soft as a baby Harpy Eagle's feather with a nice vintage feel to it. We have Men's Athletic grey S-XXL. For the women we have the Athletic grey in sizes S,M,L.

This design started it all for Statriot. Thanks for the memories. BIg fellers, take note of the XXL, this one's for you.

name: High Wide and Handsome-Ram
description:
It's high, it's wide, and most certainly, it is handsome. It's the ovis canadensis. The bighorn sheep. This majestic ungulate is just as happy roaming the rocky crags and peaks of the Rocky Mountains as it is browsing grass.
Printed on an American Apparel 50/25/25 Tri-Coffee shirt. For the gents we have S-XXL and the ladies we have S-L.

name: SALE: Djion Hecho
description:
Hecho En Montana blowout! Los T-Shirts del Revolucion. 

These are yellow (officially "Djion") printed in Montana on high quality American Apparel 100% cotton. Mens and Womens sizes.

name: SALE: Missoula --Monfuckintana Bear Skull
description:
Celebrating the Missoula area Statriot calls home. Printed on black American Apparel t shirts. The idea behind this shirt, which says "MSLA -- MFT" and has a wrought iron gate (sybolizing Hellgate Canyon) and a a grizzly skull is a celebration of Missoula, Monfuckintana.

Note that some of these actually say the words "Missoula, Monfuckintana" and others only say "MSLA-MFT".

Unisex are on 100% cotton. Women's on cotton poly blend.

name: Sticker: Monfuckintana High, Wide and Handsome Strip
description: This 2" x 5.5" waterproof sticker is what you want for your bumper, bicycle, scooter, bi-plane, or canoe. Also a great stocking stuffer! Bold, like Montana.

name: Totes
description: The Tote revolution is well underway, brothers and sisters! We here at Statriot Industries are positioned at the forefront of the revolution. We are the solution to the problem brothers and sisters. Sustainable, stylish and strong. Real strong. From books to cold brew, these totes welcome any cargo. State Seal on Navy and the HWH Prong on black. The world is yours, take it now!

name: New! Idaho: Eagle Head & Soaring Eagle
description:
World class, man. World class. The baldie and the Gem State go together like home fries and ketchup, friend, and here they are together at last. Printed on Anvil Organic tee-shirts.

Tees and Totes available at the Moscow, ID Food Co-Op too.

name: Pullover Hoodie: Montanka (Brown)
description:
The ever popular Andy Smetanka design with clouds, mountains, water and all of it, enframed by one of Western America's most beautiful state boundaries, Montana. Friend, it's all on a American Apparel Hoodie. Printed by Garage Tees in Missoula, USA.

Sizes medium through XL, unisex, and pullover style.

name: Pullover Hoodie: Wapiti
description:
This yellow on brown look's real big in Canada right now, man. Anyhow, what can we say. The Wapiti. Elk. Big deer. King of the pine forests. The super ungulate. A majestic, bugling herd animal. Montana, the Treasure State of the west. Lightning bolt, the raw power that is ol' Ma Nature at her level wildest. It's all here, you can wear it.

It's an American Apparel pullover hoodie, unisex and ready to be put to the test. Sizes XS-XL

name: Hecho En Montana
description:
We're pretty sure "Montana" is a word that's Latin in nature, and this design pays tribute to that fact, along with the excellent design qualities of the Mexican version of "Made in the USA." We've always liked that design's simplicity and boldness, and figured "Hey, let's turn that eagle into an osprey, and make this thing a Statriot shirt!" These are printed right here in the Treasure State on domestically produced, high quality American Apparel 50/50 shirts in black.

Photographs by Andy Kemmis.

name: Tote Bag: Leanin' Pronghorn
description: Whether you're toting groceries, library/school books, or shotgun shells and pigeons, this tote'll help you get it there with style. Bag made in China. Printing done in Montana. Black ink on Yellow 100% cotton bag.

name: High, Wide and Handsome: Ponderosa
description:
The state tree of Big Sky Country is known for it's many other names. It's the "Bull Pine," the "Blackjack Pine" "Pinus Ponderosa" and "Western Yellow Pine." Our favorite part is the fact that when its bark gets hot in direct summer heat, it smells like a nice tray of oatmeal cookies. 

And recently, these beauties have come under attack from the feared Pine Beetle. All this to say, trees rule. Ponderosas are Montana's state trees, and by gum, viva la Ponderosa.

This design is printed with water-based inks.

Photographs by Andy Kemmis.

name: High, Wide and Handsome: Ponderosa (Women's)
description:
The state tree of Big Sky Country is known for it's many other names. It's the "Bull Pine," the "Blackjack Pine" "Pinus Ponderosa" and "Western Yellow Pine." Our favorite Ponderosa fact is that when its bark gets hot in direct summer heat, it smells like a nice tray of oatmeal cookies. And recently, these beauties have come under attack from the feared Pine Beetle. All this to say, trees rule. Ponderosas are Montana's state trees, and by gum, viva la Ponderosa.

This design's printed with water-based inks on Alternative Apparel shirts.

name: Sticker: Montana Closer
description:
This is a design that's actually named for (what we thought) was the Joy Division record called "Closer" (which it turns out is actually "Unknown Pleasures")... this one is simple, stark and cold, like the ice and rock that reign from the crown of the continent. No hidden messages here, just the beauty of granite and snow, set against a pale backdrop. 

Sticker is U.S. printed, waterproof and measures 4" wide by approximately 2.5" high.

name: Statriot Gift Certificate
description:
Sometimes, you're not sure of the tastes of your gift recipient. You're not sure if they're a Tres Hombres era ZZ top fan, or an Afterburner type, so you get 'em that gift certificate to Ear Candy, and hell, they can get some Shabba Ranks if they want. You know what we're saying? We hardly do ourselves. 

However, we do get the concepts of gift certificates, and will issue them, on your behalf to whomever you'd like us to, and for convenient denominations, enough to buy shirts, stickers, koozies and the like.

Be sure to include instructions to us about whom you'd like us to make this out to, and if you want it sent to them directly and so forth. Otherwise we'll send it to you to give. Folks can use them over the web as well, simply by emailing us through the website, letting us know their unique gift certificate # and ordering away.

name: Sticker: Hecho En Montana
description:
We're pretty sure "Montana" is a word that's Latin in nature, and this design pays tribute to that fact, along with the excellent design qualities of the Mexican version of "Made in the USA." We've always liked that design's simplicity and boldness, and figured "Hey, let's turn that eagle into an osprey, and make this thing a Statriot sticker!"

This sticker was printed in the U.S., is waterproof and guaranteed to please. It measures roughly 4"x4".

name: State Seal Tank
description: Whoa! Exciting new product alert, just in time for the best time for being sleeveless in Shelby, Charlo and Stevensville. It's the Statriot State Seal design, on a tank. What you see, as they say, is what you get. American Apparel, American made, Montana-printed cotton.

name: Sticker: Monfuckintana
description: This waterproof, U.S.A. silkcreened 1" x  6" strip sticker is the perfect size to place onto your bicycle, stroller, Jawa motorcycle or Dacia vehicle. Short, sweet and simple. Monfuckintana.

name: Sticker: High, Wide and Handsome Ram
description: This crowd pleaser is 3" in diameter, perfectly round and waterproof as all getout. Adhere it to anything from a Thermos to Peavey Rage guitar amplifier. Printed right here in the U.S., amigo.

name: Montana Coat of Arms
description:
Whether you know her as "the Treasure State", "home", or are just a fan or member of the Montanan diaspora, there's no question that Montana is high, wide, handsome and entirely easy on the eyes. This Coat of Arms captures Montana's rolling prairie and wheat country, it's rugged mountainous country, and it's soaring wildlife. The design borrows from the tradition of european coats of arms for local counts and voivodships, and we've added some foreign markings to .. exoticise the sometimes plain latin alphabet. Printed on a American Apparel 100% Cotton Navy shirt. Mens S-XL. Womens S-L

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: Kids Montana Closer
description:
The Closer design's one of our newest, and it's got a certain stark, clean appeal. We like that it's got just a stark, snowy mountain range, set against a pale winter sky. That's it, clean and simple. Sizes 6,8, and 10. Printed on 100% Cotton Black American Apparel.

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: Kids Hecho en Montana
description:
Our ever popular style now available to children of nearly all ages. 

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: Pullover Hoodie: Leanin' Pronghorn (Grey)
description: The ever popular Leanin' Pronghorn deign, simple, clean and available for his or her pleasure. Printed in Montana on American-made American Apparel sweatshirts. AA sweatshirts are a lightweight, yet durable product.

name: Montana Closer
description:
A design that's actually named for (what we thought) was the Joy Division record called "Closer" (which it turns out is actually "Unknown Pleasures")... this one is simple, stark and cold, like the ice and rock that reign from the crown of the continent. No hidden messages here, just the beauty of granite and snow, set against a pale backdrop.
Printed on American Apparel 100% cotton black tee shirts. Men S-XL Womens S-L.

name: Oil and Wheat
description: Whether you hail from Moore, Montana or Machias, Maine it simply doesn’t matter. This shirt draws a lot of water where ever you go. Nested state border with wheat and oil derrick border. Let the world know you drum to your own rhythm. The Oil and Wheat.. only from Statriot Designs. Mens S thru XL and Womens S thru L on Tri-Black Track Shirt 50/25/25 Blend American Apparel.

name: Kids Montanka
description:
This Andy Smetanka-designed beaut's been seen on good lookin' folks from Wibaux to West Glacier, from Culberston to the, uh, cattle guard at the Monida exit off I-15. Now it's time that the small folks got a shot! Yep, this is printed on American made stock, printed in Missoula and is guaranteed to make your youngster look sharp!

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: Wapiti: Idaho
description:
The Gem State of the west is a land famous for more than its tubers, friend. From the lake-studded north to the arid south, Idaho's a place of glorious beauty. This shirt, the Idaho Wapiti features the state's waterways, its big ungulates, and one of our Statriot hallmark symbols, the lightning bolt. Say no more, and look for these in person in Moscow, at the Moscow Food Co-Op!
moscowfood.coop

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: Leanin' Pronghorn: Monfuckintana
description:
A timeless classic, ready for action whether worn in quiet defiance under a top layer, or as a front-n-center "hey, check it out"-style fashion accoutrement. The lean of the pronghorn sort of tells folks, "hey, you know, fuck it."

In fellers' sizes we have Athletic grey and indigo in the Track Shirt 50/25/25 blend. For you sheilas (women) we have the Athletic grey and indigo in the 50/25/25 blend. We have Men's S-XL and some 2XLs email for info. Women's S-L.

name: Wapiti: Montana
description: Ghost of the forest. Wapiti. "Big deer." Whatever you call them, this tee pays homage to North America’s greatest ungulate the Rocky Mountain Elk. You don’t even have to be an Elk enthusiast to appreciate the majesticity of this tee. For the bulls we have this one in the Athletic blue Track Shirt by American Apparel which is a cotton 50/25/25 blend, S,M,L, and XL.

name: Lightning Bolts: Monfuckintana
description:
Bold, fearless, agile, uncompromising, I could be talking about Montana’s favorite native son Evel Knievel but actually I’m describing this shirt. Is it an Osprey, Eagle, wild turkey, its what ever you want it to be, broseph. 

Gentlemen's Sizes S through XL and Gentleladies' S through L- Tri-Indigo in the Track Shirt 50/25/25 blend by the one and only American Apparel.

name: Portland Coat of Arms
description: The west's City of Roses is a unique town with penchants for forward-thinking, community interdependence and western-style independence. The Portland Coat of Arms uses a European-influenced design scheme to honor the city's unique spirit, do-it-yourself culture and natural beauty. As with all Statriot shirts, this design is are printed (in Missoula, Montana) on sweatshop-free, L.A. made cotton poly American Apparel stock.

name: High Wide & Handsome-Pronghorn
description: This high speed ungulate is second only to the cheetah in vigorously moving itself along the terra, man. We think they're incredible creatures, and shucks, here's to 'em! We've got Men's Small through XXL and Women's Small through Large. These are printed on American Apparel Tri-Black Track Shirt 50/25/25 blend.

name: High Wide & Handsome-Bison
description:
The king/queen of the prairies, the American Buffalo, once roamed freely and numbered in the millions. After a century of slaughter, only a few of these majestic ungulates have held on. Now the center of controversy any time they move their range outside of their fenced-in habitat, the buffalo is a proud, melancholy reminder of the wild past of the American plains. The Bison design marks the third in the High, Wide and Handsome series, preceded by the Trout and Pronghorn designs.

Printed on American Apparel shirts. 100% Organic Fine Jersey cotton construction Color Cinder Women's S-XL (XL on Anvil organic) and Men's S,M,L, and XL.

name: Koozie: HWH Ram
description: This design features a Rocky Mtn. Bighorn sheep and screams atop a snowy granite outcrop: "High, Wide and Handsome, friend." Fill this with your favorite cold boisson, be it a 16.9 oz Pilsener Urquell, a 16 oz. Kettlehouse, or a wee little 12 oz can of Mr. Pibb. We guarantee beverages stay colder, longer in these. At minim, your hand won't get cold holding a cold drink.

name: Koozie: State Seal
description:
It's a royal blue with gold ink wonder, a majestic tribute to the beauty of the Treasure State. From her wondrous megafauna and avian beasts, to her rocky and iconic crags. Montana's a wonderland for the enthusiastic picture-taker, naturalist, and hunter. Gatherers too.

Now available!

name: Koozie: Pronghorn
description:
Folks, the time has come for Statriot to introduce the Monfuckintana coozie. We know it's been a long time coming, but alas your favorite alcoholic beverage or diet soft drink can now be sheathed in a stylish, cold prolonging Koozie. With the holidays coming these little guys make great stocking stuffers, birthday gifts, or hey, any-time, "I was thinking about you" gifts for the whole family. Never again shall a canned beverage get warm before its time. Coozie it. Huge shipment to arrive any day now.

Some call them a can-cozie. We've always known 'em as "coozies."

name: Koozie: Montana Closer
description:
The stark, clean lines of this this newest of our designs has been a big hit down in Broadus. Pretty much everybody's either wearing it or using one of these sharp, cold-enhancing, can-fitting coozies to keep their canned beverages cold. It's called Closer because that's where you'll want to keep it! Hup, enjoy.

Whether your sippin' an ice cold Faygo cream soda, a diet Mr. Pibb, or a Keystone Ice, the Statriot Coozie goes where you go. It holds your drinks. It puts a warm barrier between your hand and your can. It keeps your hand from warming your can. Can you bear to live without it?

name: High Wide & Handsome-Trout
description:
High, wide and handsome, adjectives often used to describe the great state of Montana. This is Statriot designed tee is a perennial favorite. Show the trout enthusiast in your family some love this season with a High, Wide and Handsome shirt. Black and gold ink on the finest cotton blends American Apparel has to offer.

Lads and Lasses-Athletic Grey 50/25/25 blend. Men's S through XL. Women's S-L.

name: NEW! Arizona Closer
description:
Hot off the presses, Statriot expands south to the land of Grand Canyons, Saguaro Cacti and meteor craters among other natural and beautiful wonders. Created both for men and women. Limited sizes available currently.

Photographs by Andy Kemmis. Check out andrewkemmis.com!

name: Oregon- Beaver Bolt
description: Whether you know it as the "Beaver State" or the "Hard-Case State", Oregon is a land of enchantment, with its high arrid deserts, powerful rivers, coastal rainforests, high mountains, and long beautiful beaches. Statriot's Beaver Bolt design celeberates the outstanding diversity of Oregon's outdoors, megafauna and culture.  As with all Statriot shirts, this design is are printed (in Missoula, Montana) on sweatshop-free, L.A. made American Apparel stock. Althletic Grey and Black 50/50 T-Shirts Sizes Mens S-XL. Womens S-L

options.name: Tote Bag (Black, w. white ink, cotton)
